title.narrative: The Commonwealth Youth Gender and Equality Network

description.narrative: DFAT will support the RCS to continue to build upon its Commonwealth policy research and campaign work on gender quality. This work includes child and forced marriage and other forms of violence against girls and young women. RCS will support the facilitation of a Network of young advocates across the Commonwealth to harness youth voice and action, and to respond to a gap in structures, policy and practice. The network will bring together young professionals and activists from every Commonwealth region who are already engaged with gender advocacy and policy work, with the aim of forming a strong cadre of advocates who can effectively share knowledge and information, and instigate youth-led action. The aim is to amplify youth voices on gender issues within the Commonwealth and its structures, which are currently missing. The program has three strands: *Convene a five day international forum in Spring 2015 at which the network will be launched; participants will interact with policy expe
